verses.text: Yictax yichb’anel, manh jantacoc yaelal ix yak'och heb' ajk'ol t'a quib'anh a onh israel onh tik. Yuj chi' a ticnaik kalek icha tik:
Manhxo jantacoc yaelal ix yak'och heb' ajk'ol t'a quib'anh yictax t'a yichb’anel, palta maj tzak'wanlaj chi' t'ayonh.
Ixlajwi yich ko patic smak'an heb', te niwan chequel ix aj staji schiq'uil yich ko patic chi' yuj heb'.
Axo Jehová, tojol toni, ha' ix onh colan t'a yol sk'ab' heb' sk'ulan chukal chi', xco chiokab'i.
Ha heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'a Sion, q'uixwokab' heb', b'atokab' heb' elelal.
Icha tz'aj anh ank'ultak sq'uib' t'a yib'anh pat, jab'nhej sq'uib' steel, elanhchamel stacjieli, ichokab' ta' tz'aj heb'.
Ha anh ank'ultak chi', max ko jochlaj anh, max ko tzek'paxlaj anh t'a manojail.
Manh ol yal-laj heb' anima tzek' t'a stz'ey anh ank'ultak chi': Yak'okab' syaxilal Jehová t'a yib'anh anh. Sco k'an yaxilal t'a yib'anh anh, manh xchioc heb'.
